name: slever-html
description: A Lightweight Framework based on Javascript built for rapid development
author: Divine Niiquaye <hello@biuhub.net> (https://biurad.ml)

scripts.build: terser js/slever.js -c -m --keep-fnames --source-map includeSources,url=slever.min.js.map -o build/slever.min.js && terser js/slever.js js/template.js -c -m --keep-fnames --source-map includeSources,url=template.min.js.map -o build/template.min.js
